divs: Sighting DetailsGetting ready for bed. My wife was sleeping, but was woken up by the houseshaking. No sightings, but a massive sound that covered several miles and lasted10 minutes. Similar to a huge engine, like a locomotive starting up, but muchlarger. On the scale of an earthquake or tornado that sounds like a train cominginto you house. Came from west of Beachwood,Ohio. Some activity 2-3 miles awayprobably shaker heights with a helicopter circling for over 20 minutes.Policedepartments had other complaints, but no answers.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Beachwood
This sighting has never been favorited.
